text: in this video you'll see how you can
create custom ticket systems for amazon
devops guru notifications
with this capability you can natively
integrate devops guru with aws systems
manager to create ops items for the
insights that are generated or integrate
devops guru with third party incident
management tools from pagerduty and
atlassian to automatically manage
incidents within those platforms
to begin let's go to devops guru
devops guru is a fully managed machine
learning powered service that
automatically detects issues and helps
improve application availability
it's easy to enable integration between
devops guru and system center ops center
simply select this checkbox on the
devops guru settings page and then click
enable
now when devops guru generates an
insight it will simultaneously create an
ops item in ops center before we go to
ops center let's take a look at the
insights that devops guru has generated
we can click any insight to view its
underlying metrics
we can view both aggregated metrics and
graphed anomalies
the timeline shows what occurred for the
relevant metrics
related events if any display here
recommendations are provided that can
help us to resolve the problem
at the top of the page we can see the
ops item id associated with this insight
the ops item id is a link that takes us
to aws systems manager ops center
here we can view the ops item details
and the related resources for the
insight
we can leverage this information and ops
center functionality to further view
investigate and resolve our operational
issues
devops guru can be similarly integrated
with third-party tools from pagerduty
and atlassian to allow automatic
incident management from those platforms
as well
you've just seen how to create custom
ticket systems for devops guru
notifications
